attributes.background: The ice cream balls called calippo shots were discontinued and this has brought great sadness to me and many others. Please Lizz Truss before you are booted out of parliament, do one good thing for our country… BRING THEM BACK!

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to produce are a matter for individual food manufacturers, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
